context.content: Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I love thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, exciting and daring adventure movies, and humorous and entertaining flicks. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I'm excited to see what kind of movies the recommender will suggest based on my preferences. I hope they recommend something thrilling, adventurous, and humorous!

context.content: I haven't seen The Avengers (2012). Can you tell me more about it?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about The Avengers (2012). I hope it's a perfect mix of thrilling action, daring adventure, and entertaining humor. I wonder if it will meet all my preferences. The recommender seems knowledgeable, but I need more details before deciding.

context.content: It's a superhero movie. It's about a team of superheros who are sent to the future to stop a terrorist conspiracy. It has a lot of action and adventure.
That sounds interesting! Does The Avengers (2012) also have humor and entertainment?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about The Avengers (2012). It sounds like it has a lot of action and adventure, which I love. I wonder if it also has the humor and entertainment I'm looking for. The recommender is doing a good job of describing the movie, but I need to make sure it has all the elements I'm looking for.

context.content: Yes, it does. It is a comedy and adventure movie.

Wow, The Avengers (2012) sounds like a great movie! I love the idea of a team of superheroes on an adventure to stop a terrorist conspiracy. The mix of action, adventure, and comedy sounds perfect for me. I can't wait to watch it! Thank you for the recommendation! [END]

The humor and entertainment aspects also make it sound like a perfect fit for me. I can't wait to watch it!
